name: Food delivery Ui kit / Demo
description:
A mobile app for restaurant food delivery. Fully customizable layers, more than 30 screens, more than 100 components. The app is suitable for restaurants and food delivery.

The Good Sushi UI kit is brilliantly designed with great care and attention to detail. Everything is created in Figma.

✅ Logical structure and naming. All layers are named according to the structure and logic, which makes editing even more convenient.

✅ Convenient component system. Easy setup and replacement of components. The system is easy to use.

✅ Customize fonts in 2 clicks. Change fonts for any project quickly, conveniently and easily.

✅ Change color themes. Well customizable color system, change colors in 2 clicks.

✅ 30+ screens ready to combine. Customize, combine, create great designs with ease and in a short time.

I hope you enjoy the UI Kit. If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact me🐱

Made with love 💛
